title: [Solved][Spectator mode] Hiding HUD while showing who has been killed
body:
Hello.
So, I am having a problem where if I were to hide my HUD, while looking back through my past games it does not show who has been killed.
For example, Viegar killed Oriana - rather it shows nothing.
Is there a fix to this?

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa those death 'pop-ups' are coded as being part of the HUD, so turning the HUD off is always going to remove those as well.
